example.code:
PS C:\> Remove-EC2NetworkAcl -NetworkAclId acl-12345678
Confirm Are you sure you want to perform this action? Performing operation "Remove-EC2NetworkAcl (DeleteNetworkAcl)" on Target "acl-12345678". [Y] Yes [A] Yes to All [N] No [L] No to All [S] Suspend [?] Help (default is "Y"):
example.description: This example deletes the specified network ACL. You are prompted for confirmation before the operation proceeds, unless you also specify the Force parameter.
